text: tatha un logon ne, us khetee aur pashuon mein, jinhen allaah ne paida kiya hai, usaka ek bhaag nishchit kar diya, phir apane vichaar se kahate hain: ye allaah ka hai aur ye un (devataon) ka hai, jinhen unhonne (allaah ka) saajhee banaaya hai. phir jo unake banaaye hue saajhiyon ka hai, vah to allaah ko nahin pahunchata, parantu jo allaah ka hai, vah unake saajhiyon[1] ko pahunchata hai. ve kya hee bura nirnay karate hain
